definitions.definition: A river (the Amite River ) in Mississippi and Louisiana , United States , which flows into Lake Maurepas .
The short name for Amite City , a city in Louisiana , United States .

main_definition: A river (the Amite River ) in Mississippi and Louisiana , United States , which flows into Lake Maurepas .
secondary_definitions: The short name for Amite City , a city in Louisiana , United States .
